trans-unit.source: Destroy all tapped creatures. Until your next turn, whenever a creature becomes tapped, destroy it.

trans-unit.resname: REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Emerge {6}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
trans-unit.target: Emerge {6}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

trans-unit.resname: REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Cresting Mosasaurus enters the battlefield, if you cast it, return each non-Dinosaur creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: When Cresting Mosasaurus enters the battlefield, if you cast it, return each non-Dinosaur creature to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: It preyed on anything it could sink its teeth into.
trans-unit.target: It preyed on anything it could sink its teeth into.

trans-unit.resname: REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Spitting Dilophosaurus enters the battlefield or attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Spitting Dilophosaurus enters the battlefield or attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.

trans-unit.resname: REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control with -1/-1 counters on them can't block.
trans-unit.target: Creatures your opponents control with -1/-1 counters on them can't block.

trans-unit.resname: REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dinosaur spells you cast have prowl {2}{R}. (You may cast a spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a creature with any of its creature types.)
trans-unit.target: Dinosaur spells you cast have prowl {2}{R}. (You may cast a spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a creature with any of its creature types.)

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Card Name
REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever a nontoken creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Life breaks free. It expands to new territories and crashes through barriers. Painfully, maybe even dangerously. But, uh, well there it is."\n—Ian Malcolm
trans-unit.target: "Life breaks free. It expands to new territories and crashes through barriers. Painfully, maybe even dangerously. But, uh, well there it is."\n—Ian Malcolm

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature with power 4 or greater.

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a Dinosaur creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. It gains indestructible until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a Dinosaur creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. It gains indestructible until your next turn.

trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — For each opponent, up to one target noncreature artifact they control becomes a 0/4 Wall artifact creature with defender for as long as you control this Saga. II — Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. It gains haste until end of turn. III — Destroy all Walls. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
trans-unit.target: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — For each opponent, up to one target noncreature artifact they control becomes a 0/4 Wall artifact creature with defender for as long as you control this Saga. II — Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. It gains haste until end of turn. III — Destroy all Walls. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Welcome to ....) Each Dinosaur card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.) {T}: Add {G} for each Dinosaur you control.
trans-unit.target: (Transforms from Welcome to ....) Each Dinosaur card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Partner with Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Owen into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

trans-unit.resname: REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: For each kind of counter on Blue, Loyal Raptor, each other Dinosaur you control enters the battlefield with a counter of that kind on it.
trans-unit.target: For each kind of counter on Blue, Loyal Raptor, each other Dinosaur you control enters the battlefield with a counter of that kind on it.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a tapped token that's a copy of Compy Swarm.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a tapped token that's a copy of Compy Swarm.

trans-unit.source: {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Discover X, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery. trans-unit.target: {10}{B}{G}: Monstrosity 10. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature with power 4 or greater your opponents control. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

trans-unit.target: When Grim Giganotosaurus becomes monstrous, destroy all artifacts and creatures other than Grim Giganotosaurus.

REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist and other Human creatures you control have exploit. (When a creature with exploit enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control exploits a non-Human creature, draw a card. If the exploited creature had power 3 or greater, create a Treasure token.

REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Whenever a player draws their second card each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library.

trans-unit.source: As Indominus Rex, Alpha enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. It enters with a flying counter on it if a card discarded this way has flying.
